title.en: Hands-on-Training on Optical Instrumentation: Imaging systems, Interferometry and Holography
title.et: Praktiline koolitus optiliste instrumentide kasutamiseks pildindussüsteemides, interferomeetrias ja holograafias

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en:
The course will provide hands-on training on opto-mechanical components, building optical set ups such as imaging and holography systems and interferometers, optimizing them and making measurements.
The course is predominantly experimental with informative lectures to describe the theory and concepts of the respective optical instrumentation.
description.et: Kursus annab praktilise väljaõppe optomehaaniliste komponentide kasutamiseks optiliste seadistuste - pildindus- ja holograafiasüsteemide ning interferomeetrite - ehitamise ja optimeerimise ning nendega mõõtmiste tegemise kaudu.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to provide a basic understanding of optical instruments, their design and construction for imaging and sensing applications. The course will describe and demonstrate the functions of passive optical components such as lens, prism, beamsplitter, polarizer, neutral density filter, spectral filter, pinholes, iris and active opto-electronic devices such as spatial light modulators and image sensors.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärk on anda põhiline arusaam optilistest instrumentidest, nende projekteerimisest ja ehitusest pildindus - ja tunnetusrakendusteks. Kursusel tutvustatakse selliste passiivsete optiliste komponentide funktsioone nagu objektiiv, prisma, kiirgusejagaja, polarisaator, neutraalne tihedusfilter, spektraalfilter, kinnitusavad, teravustaja ja aktiivsed optoelektroonilised seadmed nagu ruumilised valgusvälja modulaatorid ja kaamerad.

learning_outcomes.en: At the end of the course, the student has
*	Knowledge on safely handling optical components and light sources.
learning_outcomes.et: · Teadmised optiliste komponentide ja valgusallikate ohutu käsitsemise kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knowledge on the functions of various light sources, passive and active optical components.
learning_outcomes.et: · Teadmised erinevate valgusallikate, passiivsete ja aktiivsete optiliste komponentide funktsioonide kohta.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Skills to build optical setups using optical and opto-mechanical components on optical table.
learning_outcomes.et: · Oskused optiliste seadistuste ehitamiseks optiliste ja optomehaaniliste komponentide abil optilisele lauale.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knowledge and skills to build a microscope, telescope, interferometers and holography system on optical table.
learning_outcomes.et: · Teadmised ja oskused mikroskoobi, teleskoobi, interferomeetrite ja holograafiasüsteemi ehitamiseks optilisele lauale.

learning_outcomes.en: *	Knowledge and skills to make measurements using image sensor and extract useful information.
learning_outcomes.et: ·Teadmised ja oskused, et teha mõõtmisi pildianduri abil ja välja võtta kasulikku infot.

grade_evaluation.et:
Optical experimental lab assignments - 10 points
Optical design homework - 20 points
Seminars on published work - 20 points
Project work - 20 points
Experimental optical instrumentation exam  - 30 points

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)
